article_title: Blue Cross And Blue Shield NC Pushing Health Care Price Transparency

article_metadata.author: Katherine Restrepo

og.description: It’s been almost two months since Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina went public with its health care cost estimator tool. Regardless of whether you have a BCBS card, anyone can now compare average costs for more than 1,200 procedures in just about any zip code across the [...]
